{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21293v1", "title": "Stochastic Volterra integral equations driven by $ G $-Brownian motion", "summary": "In this paper, we study the stochastic Volterra integral equation driven by
$G$-Brownian motion ($G$-SVIE). The existence, uniqueness and two types of
continuity of the solution to $G$-SVIE are obtained. Moreover, combining a new
quasilinearization technique with the two-step approximation method, we
establish the corresponding comparison theorem for a class of $G$-SVIEs. In
particular, by means of this method, the classical assumptions on partial
derivatives of the coefficients are unnecessary.", "main_category": "math.PR", "categories": "math.PR", "published": "2025-04-30T03:58:38Z"}
